description: Number of iterations until n reaches 1 or 4 under x goes to sum of squares of digits map.
references: A. Porges, A set of eight numbers, Amer. Math. Monthly, 52 (1945), 379-382.
J. Roberts, Lure of the Integers, Math. Assoc. America, 1992, p. 13.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, _Mira Bernstein_
